漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-02：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-07-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  北京菲斯特诺科技有限公司(http://www.firstknow.cn/)开发的google搜：bookmululist.aspx sql注入问题主要发生在：/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1   content过滤不严导致sql注射案例如下：http://www.cnpc-ngo.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.scdwzz.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.zootax.com.cn/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://zootax.firstknow.com.cn/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.rjggy.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.yqtdmgc.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.formarket.net/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.zglcyx.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.sygcjs.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.ent-bull.com.cn/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.syshjn.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://firstknow.cn:6677/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.gaskk.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.lyyhg.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.cnpc-ngo.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.dzdczz.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.shzyq.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.xbzzlt.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.zhuzaojishu.net/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.zlyfyzl.cn/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.dzdczz.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.shzyq.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1http://www.zhuzaobook.com/select_e.aspx?type=gjz&content=-1   漏洞证明：
